body.name: Neutrogena Fresh Foaming Gentle Daily Facial Cleanser & Makeup Remover, Soap Free, Removes Dirt, Oil & Waterproof Makeup, Non-Comedogenic & Hypoallergenic, 6.7 fl. oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 25 - 27 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
FREE pickup February 22 - 24 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 6.7-fluid ounce pump bottle of Neutrogena Fresh Foaming Gentle Daily Cleanser cleanses skin and washes away dirt, oil and makeup in one easy step for refreshingly clean skin
Neutrogena all-in-one makeup remover and daily facial cleanser creates a foamy lather that cleanses without over-drying skin and helps remove even waterproof makeup in one easy step
This gentle foaming face wash is non-comedogenic so it won't clog pores
Dermatologist-tested foaming facial cleanser is hypoallergenic and made with glycerin. This gentle daily face wash features a formula that is soap free for refreshingly clean skin
From a dermatologist-recommended skincare brand, Neutrogena Fresh Foaming Gentle Daily Cleanser rinses completely clean with no pore-clogging residue left behind
body.description: Cleanser with Glycerin. This all-in-one makeup remover and facial cleanser helps remove makeup, even waterproof eye makeup, and leaves skin feeling refreshingly clean. Neutrogena Fresh Foaming Daily Face Wash creates a foamy lather that easily washes away dirt and oil without over-drying skin. Dermatologist-tested, the gentle formula with glycerin rinses completely clean, with no pore-clogging residue for refreshingly clean skin. From a dermatologist-recommended skincare brand, this facial foaming cleanser is hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic, so it won't clog pores.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #19,297 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #302 in Facial Cleansing Washes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fresh Foaming Cleanser Fresh Foaming Cleanser is a facial cleanser and makeup remover in one. Removing makeup before you go to bed has never been easier. This dermatologist-tested formula effectively removes dirt, oil and makeup from your face for clearer skin. It is a gentle makeup remover that easily removes eye makeup, without soaps or oils that can sting or irritate the sensitive eye area. No more raccoon eyes! It rinses completely and won't leave any pore-clogging residue.Forget the excuses and get refreshingly clean skin and complete makeup removal in one step. At a Glance: Soap-free Oil-free Non-comedogenic (won’t clog pores) Hypoallergenic 6.7 fluid ounces Dermatologist Recommended Skincare Brand #1 Most Awarded Cleansing Brand

How to Use: Wet your face and hands with lukewarm water. Pump cleanser into your hands and work into lather. Massage lather onto skin with a gentle, circular motion. Rinse with lukewarm water and pat dry with a soft towel.Recommended with Alcohol Free Toner Alcohol-Free Toner refreshes skin without stripping its natural moisturizers.It is specially formulated to provide clean, refreshing toning without the harsh drying effects of alcohol. Special mild purifiers gently remove impurities and recondition skin.

About NEUTROGENA Headquartered in Los Angeles, California, Neutrogena Corporation manufactures and markets products in over 70 countries. A dermatologist recommended skincare brand, Neutrogena offers some of the world’s most loved beauty and skincare lines. Neutrogena got its start when it launched the innovative and iconic Amber Facial Cleansing Bar in the U.S. in 1954 and, since then, the brand has continued to offer high quality products that earn consumers trust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great find for a great price!
reviews.reviewText: Love this stuff!I have super sensitive skin and everything I would use would feel like it was burning my skin. Not this! I love it! It has a light scent and removes any dirt and makeup from my skin! Best part, it doesn’t irritate my skin or make it feel like it’s on fire! I highly recommend it! 🥰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've been using this product for years, my favorite cleanser for dry-normal skin.
reviews.reviewText: My skin profile is normal around the T zone, and dry on my cheeks and chin. I've been using this product for 10+ years, I can really say for me it has worked great. I stopped using it for about 4 months and my skin was dry and I broke out. A couple weeks after reusing it, my skin was back to normal. I also love the price point!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As good as Purity but a lot less money
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using Purity by Philosophy for years, no more, this works just as well! I need very good makeup removal, I wear a lot, and this works in removing it all. I’m already loving the HUGE savings!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal! Got three bottles!
reviews.reviewText: I have used this face wash for years and was super excited to receive three bottles the very next day after ordering! Sometimes I buy the "off brand" from Walmart to save money, but found this deal on Amazon. I thought I was doing well getting one bottle for $4, but got three as pictured! Very satisfied! I don't wear a lot of makeup, but this has always done well getting mascara, etc. off and leaves my face feeling fresh and not dried out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2018
Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great facial cleanser.
reviews.reviewText: A lot of products break my skin out but this one doe not. I have oily skin and it helps to remove alot of excess oil. My face feels and looks very clean after using it. It also removes makeup very well, even the stubborn hard to get mascara off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite makeup remover.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this for many years. It’s only 1 step. Washes even my eye makeup away.I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Is really foaming.

reviews.reviewText: Ha habido veces que se me ha olvidado desmaquillar los ojos con rimel de agua o para ahorrar tiempo sólo me lavo la cara. Hace bastante espuma, hidrata la piel y desmaquillar. El olor no es es fuerte. Yo soy de piel sensible y mixta, me ha venido muy bien este producto.
Mi novia desde que lo compró por primera vez le ha ayudado mucho en las imperfecciones de la cara, no duden en adquirirlo, es increíble.
Me encanto, es muy suave no lastima la piel de la cara y me deja la piel d esa cara muy limpia
Es Perfecto , te ayuda a remover hasta los pecados 10 de 10
